record.name: Exchange Quota
record.description: Request to increase or decrease Exchange limits. Standard quota is 100 mb. If your quota is below 100 mb, no approval is needed to increase your mailbox quota up to 100mb. For higher increases, with proper business justification, and approval from both your manager and a Employee Services Infrastructure Manager (formerly Business Linkage Team member), your mailbox limit (quota) for Exchange 2000 can be increased to the next increment (250mb and 500mb). Quota increases are a cost/business impact to the Company.
record.detailedDescription: Request to increase or decrease Exchange limits. Standard quota is 100 mb. If your quota is below 100 mb, no approval is needed to increase your mailbox quota up to 100mb. For higher increases, with proper business justification, and approval from both your manager and a Employee Services Infrastructure Manager (formerly Business Linkage Team member), your mailbox limit (quota) for Exchange 2000 can be increased to the next increment (250mb and 500mb). Quota increases are a cost/business impact to the Company.
record.options: <form><select id="size" label="Storage Allowance" style="radio"><option id="0" label="150MB [+$35.00]">onefifty</option><option id="1" label="200MB [+$75.00]">twohundred</option></select></form>
